messages.title: Rosie Sharpley's contract with you
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be strong voice for Woking. I will: work to protect local health services; work to protect residents and to tackle crime and anti-social behavior; meet regularly with local service providers like the health services and residents' groups; I will be open and honest about all expenses incurred in representing you. I will: publish details on my personal website; answer questions you may have about them promptly; pay taxes personally from the use of expenses that is often the United Kingdom.

messages.title: With Labour out of the race, the choice is between Rosie Sharpley and the unknown Conservative candidate.
messages.content: Rosie lives locally and has a long record of action for us. As our local MP, Rosie will put local people first and deliver real change and fairness for our area.

messages.title: Helping people for the last 21 years

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting health services will be a top priority for Rosie.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour out of the race, Liberal Democrats out Conservatives in key seats

issues.economy: Rosie wants to see real action to help people and businesses out of the recession
issues.health: Rosie will work to protect local health services

politicalExperience.achievements: Long record of action for us

endorsements.endorsement: Liberal Democrats out Conservatives in key seats

endorsements.endorser: Independent PoliticsHome largest representative UK poll
endorsements.endorsement: "Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labouring were by theirs."

images.caption: Rosie listening to local people as she helps them with their day-to-day problems
Rosie wants to see real action to help people and businesses out of the recession
Protecting health services will be a top priority for Rosie

leaflet.additionalNotes: Rosie pledges to stand up for community concerns and have an office in the constituency open at least 5 days a week. A survey regarding community issues available each year for you to complete with a follow-up report on what is being done. Promises to be open and honest about all expenses incurred in representing you.
